description: This file defines a custom RecyclerView.ItemDecoration, specifically a simple divider used between list items with a specific color (Ocean Professional). It handles drawing a subtle line at the bottom of each item in a RecyclerView.

classes.name: ListDividerDecoration
classes.description: A custom item decoration for RecyclerView that draws a simple divider line with a specific color.

methods.name: ListDividerDecoration
methods.description: Constructor initializes paint with specified color and stroke width based on display density.

methods.name: onDraw
methods.description: Overrides the RecyclerView.ItemDecoration's onDraw to draw divider lines below each list item except the last.
